channel.title: Kundalini on Heliacal Club
channel.description: Recent content in Kundalini on Heliacal Club

item.title: Introduction to Kundalini Tantra: Part 2
item.description: Kundalini is a spiritual and energetic concept in Hinduism and yoga that refers to the awakening of a dormant energy located at the base of the spine. The concept of Kundalini has been embraced by many people as a means of achieving spiritual enlightenment and self-realization.

item.title: Introduction to Kundalini Tantra
item.description: Kundalini awakening refers to the activation and ascent of Kundalini energy, a type of spiritual energy believed to reside within the human body. According to some spiritual traditions, Kundalini energy is said to be coiled like a serpent at the base of the spine, and its awakening is thought to be associated with a range of spiritual and physical experiences.
